articles.author: Aakash Biswas
articles.title: Asian Games: Ruturaj Gaikwad, Rinku Singh & Others Cheer for Indian Hockey Team’s 10-2 Win Over Pakistan - News18
articles.description: Indian hockey team's 10-2 win over Pakistan was also witnessed by Ruturaj Gaikwad-led Indian cricket team, which will begin its campaign in the ongoing Asian Games on October 3.
articles.content: The Indian hockey team thrashed Pakistan 10-2 in the Pool A game in the ongoing Asian Games on Saturday. Captain Harmanpreet Singh found the net four times while Varun Kumar, Mandeep Singh, Sumit, Sa… [+1919 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Mirabai disappointed as injury ends her Asian Games campaign without medal - Hindustan Times
articles.description: An Asian Games medal is the only silverware missing from the Manipuri's decorated cabinet
articles.content: Ace Indian weightlifter Mirabai Chanu is disappointed that she could not realise her dream of an Asian Games medal as she suffered thigh muscle injury during the women's 49kg event here on Saturday.… [+2000 chars]
